p: Regarding the local management practices, from each farmer, we obtained information about irrigation (L/ha), fertilizer use (Kg/ha), weed, insect and fungus controls input (L/ha) ( Appendix B, Table A1). Finally, as the increasing size of habitat patches has a negative effect on insect abundance [ 34, 35], each fennel field area (ha) was measured ( Appendix B, Table A1).
